title: 1920 to 1923 style litho print font -- used on British football tickets
content:
hello

This font was used on fa cup final tickets from 1920 to 1922, the style of backgrount that the font was used on was art deco era.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110410055437im_/http:/typophile.com/files/idfont1_4764.jpg)

Thanks for any help
author: jOSE FERNANDES

comments.content: any chance of anyone having a guess for me thanks

[Charter Stamp](http://web.archive.org/web/20110410055437/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/charterstamp.html) from Harold's Fonts is very close, as is Romana. Neither is as quirky as your sample though.

- Lex
How about [De Vinne from Wooden Type Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20110410055437/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/de-vinne/)?
